body.p: Born in Kentucky on February 3, 1830. In 1851, formed D. G. Fowler & Co., a boat store in Cairo with his four brothers: Joe, WIllie, Whyte and Gus Fowler. He purchased three boats, the Dunbar,Dexter, and Silver Star. During the mid 1850's and early 1860's, he worked as a commission merchant, moving goods from Evansville, Indiana to Cairo, Tennessee. Married Laura Berry on May 17, 1853 in McCracken County, Kentucky. After the death of his first wife, Fowler married Geraldine Porter on October 19, 1859 in Henry County, Tennessee. He sided with the Confederacy in the Civil War. Fowler died in a boat explosion on the Ohio River on May 17, 1876.
